page.title: 11The older generation
page.content: We asked the people how long they have been living in Pinvin. Most people have lived there most of their life. We asked them if they enjoyed living in Pinvin. They said that it was not a very interesting village, but the people here are quite friendly. Old people have their owns organisations which help them to pass their time more pleasurably. There are over 60's meetings, womens institute, bingo ,jumble sales, fetes and strawberry teas. We asked them if they went to church and if so how often. Nearly everyone went when they could, but found it difficult to walk there every week. Many of the older folk believe in ghosts and most of them believe in reincarnation.
